Reviews.Title: “Good enough for short stays!!”
Reviews.Author: tellmemary
Reviews.Content: ive hotel nights didnt triple own space probably furniture bathroom modern shower depends trip youre doing wont suggest people coming opposite world heavy luggage theres space fine couple staying days weekend expecting able walk kitchenette fine 2 people light breakfast triple studio double beda single bed pushed double studio bed slightly double 74 inches ready feet night drafts air passing window low curtain usually warm heating doesnt properly studio heating control panel displayed written below meant error studio bathroom wrote warm lot soap towels provided glasses dishes etc fast wifi provided secretary didnt look saying complained lift temporary stuck floor 1 waiting told probably getting floor didnt care try talk reception worthed location steps 3 lines tube beautiful hyde park fire system building single time smoke reaches youll wake run downstairs fire system useful run 3 times twice half past midnight 9 morning annoying youre sleeping suggest anyway adapt inconveniences

Reviews.Title: “Appalling service.”
Reviews.Author: AlanK_11
Reviews.Content: ok little returned night 10pm told moved hotel plumbing hotel finally arrived 25 hours disgusting staff 39 suites hotel barely speak english incredibly rude disinterested avoid costs

Reviews.Title: “nice location to stay”

Reviews.Content: convenient cheap night rates nice designed clean 5 minutes walking station subway wifi free slowly street subway station tons restaurants late indian malaysian thai chinese pub fast food

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: Linbo_21
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights hotel studio apartment meant own cooking facilites brilliant tea toast quick easy eating expensive 2 streets cuisines world dining hotel 3 mins walk hyde park studio bed uncomfortable electrics bit dodgy street noise night london staff nice helpful cleaned day recommend hotel short stay location brill
